messages.title: Competent leadership or Coalition of Chaos
messages.content: Job total hits record high while wages surge. Benefits cap ‘leads more into work’. Tax cuts for workers and savers. You’re getting £10 off a tank with the Tories.

messages.title: A better future for you, your family and Britain
messages.content: The deficit down, Income tax cut, More jobs, New businesses

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Reduction of the deficit, income tax cuts, creating more jobs and supporting new businesses
Investing in the National Health Service (NHS) and elderly care
Reducing class sizes, apprenticeship in Eddisbury meaning a chance to earn a salary and get qualifications

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Labour is plotting a Scottish alliance

issues.economy: Labour plan to borrow risks £170bn extra debt. More debt, higher taxes, job loss.
issues.education: Reducing class sizes, ensuring access to apprenticeship and qualifications
issues.environment: Supporting 'buy local campaigns' to help strong high street in rural villages.
issues.health: Investing in NHS and elderly care

housing.content: The regeneration plans for Winsford rely on strong local economy and Neighbourhood Plan will help drive this change forward.

leaflet.personalStatement: A personal message from Antoinette SANDbach - Today you have the choice to stick with the Conservatives who have delivered on their promise to put our economy back on track with record numbers of jobs and apprenticeships here in Eddisbury, whilst reducing income taxes, national debt, to support local businesses, roll out rural broadband and invest in our NHS and elderly care. Don't let Labour wreck the economy - again.

images.caption: Antoinette discussing the problems of small businesses in Eddisbury
Antoinette meeting with a local farmer to talk about dairy prices
